mapper.select: SELECT DIC_ID as id, NAME as name, STATUS as status FROM T_DICT WHERE DT_ID = #{dt_id}
select d.DIC_ID as id, d.NAME as name, d.STATUS as status from t_dict d where d.dt_id = 23 and rownum <= 5 order by d.code
select d.dic_id as id,d.name as name,d.STATUS as status from t_cert_type_link c left join t_dict d on c.edu_level_id=d.dic_id where c.ct_id= #{ct_id}

select d.dic_id as id,d.name as name,d.STATUS as status from t_cert_type_link_extend c left join t_dict d on c.target_id=d.dic_id where c.link_id=(select ctl.ctl_id from t_cert_type_link ctl where ctl.ct_id = #{ct_id} and ctl.edu_level_id = #{eduLevel}) and c.target_type=1
